channel.title: Mark Adler
channel.description: Recent news about Mark Adler, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Shana Tova U'metukah! May this year be filled with much joy, health, peace and opportunity for all Canadians. #RoshHashanah

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: I had a great time last week with many of my colleagues at a BBQ with PM Harper in Toronto http://t.co/GsMCMbJLua

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Having a productive roundtable discussion with representatives from the Toronto Real Estate Board! http://t.co/MwQBBhA3Oh

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Having a great time at #pitchforisrael! So proud to be part of a Gov. that strongly supports the state of Israel http://t.co/x0P4iQ48A6

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: I am proud that today @kenneyjason & @calxandr announced federal support for a memorial for victims of Communism http://t.co/jxzSNElWUy

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Today, on #BlackRibbon Day, let us pay tribute to those who lost their lives under Communist and Totalitarian regimes.
